courses.name: Learning Django
courses.description: Django is an extremely popular and fully featured server-side web framework, written in Python

lessons.title: What is Django
lessons.content: Django is a high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design. Built by experienced developers, it takes care of much of the hassle of web development, so you can focus on writing your app without needing to reinvent the wheel. Ità³¯urce.
